I have the following T206 Graded cards for sale. Please add $3.00 for USPS shipping with tracking. Add $1.00 each for shipping of each additional card.

Spike Shannon, SGC 30, Polar Bear,  $30.00
Paul Davidson, SGC 30, Polar Bear, $30.00
Jesse Tannehill, SGC 20, Piedmont, $22.00
Red Ames, SGC 10, Piedmont, $18.00
Jack Pfeister, SGC 10, Polar Bear, $22.00
Dave Brain, SGC 10, Polar Bear, SOLD

Please contact me with any questions. Thanks, Tom

Open to trades for e90 to e106, T3, sporting news supplements. Just ask equal value for equal value.

Otherwise heading to EBAY this weekend.

Thanks,

Tom
